author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Matas Q3 EBITA Falls To DKK 207.8 Million
text:
Feb 6 (Reuters) - Matas A/S:
* INTERIM REPORT – 9M 2017/18 * ‍GUIDANCE HAS BEEN REVISED​ * ‍Q3 PROFIT AFTER TAX WAS DKK 134.2 MILLION​ * ‍Q3 2017/18 REVENUE CAME TO DKK 1,062.8 MILLION, IN LINE WITH DKK 1,064.3 MILLION REPORTED FOR Q3 2016/17​
* ‍NOW EXPECTS A DECLINE IN UNDERLYING LIKE-FOR-LIKE REVENUE OF 1-2% (PREVIOUSLY: A DECLINE OF 0-2%) FOR FY​
* SEES FY ‍EBITA BETWEEN DKK 445-460 MILLION (PREVIOUSLY: DKK 440-470 MILLION).​
* ‍Q3 EBITA WAS DKK 207.8 MILLION AGAINST DKK 214.6 MILLION IN SAME PERIOD YEAR BEFOR​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
